text: 'Blue Bloods' Star Welcomes Baby Boy: See the First Pic 'Blue Bloods' star Vanessa Ray welcomes a baby with husband Landon Beard. Blue Bloods star Vanessa Ray, who plays Officer Eddie Janko, and real-life … [Parade Magazine](/@ParadeMag) flipped this story into [Trending News](/@parademag/trending-news-qm8c6108z)•8h Related storyboards More stories from [Bridget Moynahan](/topic/bridgetmoynahan) [Blue Bloods Star Vanessa Ray Welcomes Baby Boy with Husband Landon Beard: 'Quite a Whirlwind' (Exclusive)](/topic/bridgetmoynahan/blue-bloods-star-vanessa-ray-welcomes-baby-boy-with-husband-landon-beard-quite/a-SFLK7nlfSqySWQE5huo7MQ%3Aa%3A13096440-6f96b8489f%2Fpeople.com) Vanessa Ray's family has grown by one more! The actress, who is currently starring in her tenth season of Blue Bloods, welcomed a baby boy via adoption with husband Landon Beard, she exclusively tells PEOPLE.
